name: FinishedGame_v12_final_final
description:
The entry game of team Seven Slash for Epic Games' MegaJam 2020.

A semi-3D sidescroller game, where in order to finish off your enemies and progress forwards, you have to tamper with the objects you encounter. Solve or create clever paths in the characters' respective behavior through the game's own blueprint system. Learn how to manipulate your, and the hostile characters, as well as environmental objects, with multiple correct ways to achieve victory.
